verses.roman:
pariplavaḥ sutas tasmān
medhāvī sunayātmajaḥ
nṛpañjayas tato dūrvas
timis tasmāj janiṣyati

synonyms: pariplavaḥ—Pariplava; sutaḥ—the son; tasmāt—from him (Pariplava); medhāvī—Medhāvī; sunaya-ātmajaḥ—the son of Sunaya; nṛpañjayaḥ—Nṛpañjaya; tataḥ—from him; dūrvaḥ—Dūrva; timiḥ—Timi; tasmāt—from him; janiṣyati—will take birth.
translation: The son of Sukhīnala will be Pariplava, and his son will be Sunaya. From Sunaya will come a son named Medhāvī; from Medhāvī, Nṛpañjaya; from Nṛpañjaya, Dūrva; and from Dūrva, Timi.
